text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump should be held responsible for the nearly 40,000 dead Americans from #Covid19 trump, knew about this deadly virus in November of 2019 and chose not to say or Do anything to protect the people of the country he swore to protect! #TrumpIsCRAZY
